verses.text: \w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* covenant \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Moab: \w beside|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* covenant \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* Horeb.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* Moses called \w all|strong="H1419"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* said \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* land \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Egypt \w to|strong="H7200"\w* Pharao, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* whole land.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* great temptations, \w which|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, \w those|strong="H2088"\w* mighty signs \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wonders,

\w And|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* given \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w to|strong="H5921"\w* understand, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* eyes \w to|strong="H5921"\w* see, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* ears \w that|strong="H8141"\w* \w may|strong="H7272"\w* hear, unto this present day.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* hath brought \w you|strong="H3588"\w* forty years \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* desert: \w your|strong="H3068"\w* garments \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* worn \w out|strong="H3045"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* shoes \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* feet \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* age.

\w You|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* eaten bread, \w nor|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* drunk wine \w or|strong="H4421"\w* strong drink: \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w might|strong="H4725"\w* know \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* am \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* came \w to|strong="H5414"\w* this \w place|strong="H5414"\w*: sand Sehon king \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Hesebon, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Og king \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Basan, came \w out|strong="H0853"\w* against \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* fight. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w we|strong="H0776"\w* slew \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* delivered \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w possession|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* Ruben \w and|strong="H1697"\w* Gad, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* half tribe \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Manasses.

Keep \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* covenant, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fulfill \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* understand \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* stand \w this|strong="H0834"\w* day \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H0834"\w* God, \w your|strong="H0834"\w* princes, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* tribes, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* doctors, \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* Israel,

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* children \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* stranger \w that|strong="H0834"\w* abideth \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* camp, \w besides|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hewers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* wood, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* bring water:

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w covenant|strong="H7650"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* maketh \w with|strong="H1696"\w* thee.

\w That|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1285"\w* raise thee \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0854"\w* \w himself|strong="H0905"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1285"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0595"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath spoken \w to|strong="H0854"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w as|strong="H0595"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* swore \w to|strong="H0854"\w* thy fathers Abraham, Isaac, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* Jacob.

\w Neither|strong="H0369"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* only \w do|strong="H0369"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* covenant, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confirm \w these|strong="H0834"\w* oaths,

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* present \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* absent.

\w For|strong="H6086"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* know \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H6086"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* passed \w through|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H6086"\w* nations, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* passing \w through|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*,

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* seen \w their|strong="H3068"\w* abominations \w and|strong="H3068"\w* filth, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0176"\w*, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* idols, wood \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stone|strong="H0834"\w*, silver \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gold, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* worshipped.

Lest \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H6771"\w* \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* woman, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* family \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* tribe, whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H5595"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* nations: \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* root bringing \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* gall \w and|strong="H1697"\w* bitterness.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H5612"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w oath|strong="H0423"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* bless \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* heart saying: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* peace, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* walk \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* naughtiness \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* drunken \w may|strong="H0376"\w* consume \w the|strong="H3605"\w* thirsty,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* forgive \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w but|strong="H0423"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w and|strong="H3068"\w* jealousy \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* exceedingly enkindled \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* volume \w should|strong="H3068"\w* light upon \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* blot \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* name \w from|strong="H3478"\w* under heaven,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* utterly destroy \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w according|strong="H0310"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* curses \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* contained \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* book \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* law \w and|strong="H1121"\w* covenant:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* following generation \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* say, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w born|strong="H3808"\w* hereafter, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strangers \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* afar, seeing \w the|strong="H3605"\w* plagues \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evils wherewith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath afflicted \w it|strong="H2015"\w*,

Burning \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* brimstone, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heat \w of|strong="H0776"\w* salt, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H3068"\w* sown \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H1419"\w*, nor \w any|strong="H3605"\w* green \w thing|strong="H2088"\w* grow therein, \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* example \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* destruction \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sodom \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Gomorrha, Adama \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Seboim, \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* destroyed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* indignation:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nations|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* done thus \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*? \w what|strong="H0834"\w* meaneth \w this|strong="H0834"\w* exceeding \w great|strong="H0430"\w* heat \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wrath?

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* answer: \w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* forsook \w the|strong="H0834"\w* covenant \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H5647"\w* fathers, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* brought \w them|strong="H5647"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* land \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* served strange gods, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* adored \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, whom \w they|strong="H5921"\w* knew \w not|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* whom \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* assigned:

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* kindled \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* bring \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* curses \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* volume:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* hath cast \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* anger \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* wrath, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w very|strong="H5704"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* indignation, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* hath thrown \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* strange land, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* seen \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day.
Secret things to the Lord our God: things that are manifest, to us and to our children for ever, that we may do all the words of this law.
